title: Unable to update to patch 6.20
body: HELP i am unable to update. i tried repairing it and running the hextex repair. i also tried using a different sources of internet but nothing has worked. if someone can help it would be very appreciated

replies.body:
Patching issues are typically caused by a few different factors, but the most common are either permissions issues or network settings. Since we've consolidated the most common solutions in our [Patching Issues guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues), I recommend starting there.

Let me know if you continue to have issues patching and at what percentage the failure happens.
